constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 136 (Tuesday, August 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 8725.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H7713]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

title: To provide supplemental appropriations for the Emergency Food and Shelter Program to provide humanitarian relief for migrants, and for other purposes.
